snippet: The single best decision that can help my husband and I achieve our goals is one that many newly married, affluent young adults don’t usually consider: Don’t have children.
abstract: Nadia Taha Essay discusses opting out of parenthood for financial reasons, and claims it is rather prudent; says single best decision that can help her and her husband achieve their goals is not to have children.
lead_paragraph: The single best decision that can help my husband and I achieve our goals is one that many newly married, affluent young adults don’t usually consider: Don’t have children.

headline.seo: Opting Out of Parenthood, With Finances in Mind
headline.main: Opting Out of Parenthood, With Finances in Mind
headline.print_headline: Opting Out of Parenthood, With Finances in Mind
